ygData.subject: Does heritrix3 have ways to extract licensing from webpages
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Little bit of background: I work at Kennisland, a Dutch think tank that also works for heritage institutions. Kennisland also represents Creative Commons

Hi,


Little bit of background:
I work at Kennisland, a Dutch think tank th=
at also works for heritage institutions. Kennisland also represents Creativ=
e Commons Netherlands. Usually my work resolves around issues regarding cop=
yright and technology. I=E2=80=99ve been introduced to heritrix3 today.


O=
ur national library wants to archive creativecommons.nl, as Creative Common=
s I would like to add that this website is licensed under a CC BY-SA licens=
e. As their archiving is done with heritrix3 and I see that archive.org <ht=
tp://archive.org/> labels some of its web sources with CC licenses. See htt=
ps://archive.org/search.php?query=3Dmediatype%3A%28web%29%20AND%20licenseur=
l%3A%28%2Acreativecommons%2A%29 <https://archive.org/search.php?query=3Dmed=
iatype:(web)%20AND%20licenseurl:(*creativecommons*)>


Does it do that as p=
art of the analysis that heritrix3 offers?


Cheers,


Maarten Zeinstra


-=
-
Kennisland | www.kl.nl | t +31205756720 | m +31643053919 | @mzeinstra



=
